Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Waives the state application fee for all civil service examinations for all veterans
Summary: Waives the state application fee for all civil service examinations for all veterans.
LawCode: Amd ยง50, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to waiving the state application fee for all civil service examinations for all veterans
